title: Stage 1: Create Your First Wallet
description: Learn how to set up a crypto wallet like MetaMask or Phantom to manage your assets safely.

title: Stage 2: Buy Your First Crypto
description: Understand how to use an exchange to buy Bitcoin or Ethereum and transfer them to your wallet.

title: Stage 3: Learn About NFTs
description: Explore how digital art and collectibles live on the blockchain.

title: Stage 4: Try DeFi
description: Discover decentralized finance apps that let you earn, lend, or trade without banks.

title: Stage 5: Stay Secure
description: Learn about scams, private keys, and how to keep your crypto safe.
